name: UpdateChangeEvent
description:
Updates an existing change event in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to modify details of an existing change event using PagerDuty's updateChangeEvent API. Requires appropriate OAuth scope (`change_events.write`).

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the change event to be updated.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the API to use via the `Accept` header. Required for versioning purposes.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the content type of the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: change_event_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the Change Event to be updated.

value_schema.description: The Change Event to be updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The Change Event to be updated.

value_schema.description: The Change Event to be updated.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
